name: trip-border-server
author: Nien-Tai Ho <nientaiho@gmail.com>
description: trip border server backend and postgres database

scripts.migrate:dev: NODE_ENV=development docker-compose -f compose.dev.yml exec server npx knex migrate:latest --knexfile knexfile.js
scripts.rollback:dev: NODE_ENV=development docker-compose -f compose.dev.yml exec server npx knex migrate:rollback --knexfile knexfile.js
scripts.status:dev: NODE_ENV=development docker-compose -f compose.dev.yml exec server npx knex migrate:status --knexfile knexfile.js
scripts.migrate:staging: NODE_ENV=staging docker-compose -f compose.dev.yml exec server npx knex migrate:latest --knexfile knexfile.js
scripts.rollback:staging: NODE_ENV=staging docker-compose -f compose.dev.yml exec server npx knex migrate:rollback --knexfile knexfile.js
scripts.status:staging: NODE_ENV=staging docker-compose -f compose.dev.yml exec server npx knex migrate:status --knexfile knexfile.js
